60typedef unsigned char ADI_REG_TYPE;
61
62#define AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_I2C_WR 0x0000
63#define AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_I2C_RD (1u << 0)
64
65/* VENDOR_ID - Registers (IC 1) */
66#define REG_VENDOR_ID_IC_1_ADDR 0x0
67#define REG_VENDOR_ID_IC_1_BYTE 0
68#define REG_VENDOR_ID_IC_1_VALUE 0x41
69
70/* DEVICE_ID1 - Registers (IC 1) */
71#define REG_DEVICE_ID1_IC_1_ADDR 0x1
72#define REG_DEVICE_ID1_IC_1_BYTE 0
73#define REG_DEVICE_ID1_IC_1_VALUE 0x65
74
75/* DEVICE_ID2 - Registers (IC 1) */
76#define REG_DEVICE_ID2_IC_1_ADDR 0x2
77#define REG_DEVICE_ID2_IC_1_BYTE 0
78#define REG_DEVICE_ID2_IC_1_VALUE 0x15
79
80/* REVISION - Registers (IC 1) */
81#define REG_REVISION_IC_1_ADDR 0x3
82#define REG_REVISION_IC_1_BYTE 0
83#define REG_REVISION_IC_1_VALUE 0x2
84
85/* PWR_CTRL - Registers (IC 1) */
86#define REG_PWR_CTRL_IC_1_ADDR 0x4
87#define REG_PWR_CTRL_IC_1_BYTE 1
88#define REG_PWR_CTRL_IC_1_VALUE 0x0
89
90/* CLK_CTRL - Registers (IC 1) */
91#define REG_CLK_CTRL_IC_1_ADDR 0x5
92#define REG_CLK_CTRL_IC_1_BYTE 1
93#define REG_CLK_CTRL_IC_1_VALUE 0x0
94
95/* PDM_CTRL - Registers (IC 1) */
96#define REG_PDM_CTRL_IC_1_ADDR 0x6
97#define REG_PDM_CTRL_IC_1_BYTE 1
98#define REG_PDM_CTRL_IC_1_VALUE 0x20
99
100/* DAC_CTRL1 - Registers (IC 1) */
101#define REG_DAC_CTRL1_IC_1_ADDR 0x7
102#define REG_DAC_CTRL1_IC_1_BYTE 1
103#define REG_DAC_CTRL1_IC_1_VALUE 0x14
104
105/* DAC_CTRL2 - Registers (IC 1) */
106#define REG_DAC_CTRL2_IC_1_ADDR 0x8
107#define REG_DAC_CTRL2_IC_1_BYTE 1
108#define REG_DAC_CTRL2_IC_1_VALUE 0x2
109
110/* DAC_CTRL3 - Registers (IC 1) */
111#define REG_DAC_CTRL3_IC_1_ADDR 0x9
112#define REG_DAC_CTRL3_IC_1_BYTE 1
113#define REG_DAC_CTRL3_IC_1_VALUE 0xD0
114
115/* DAC_VOL - Registers (IC 1) */
116#define REG_DAC_VOL_IC_1_ADDR 0xA
117#define REG_DAC_VOL_IC_1_BYTE 1
118#define REG_DAC_VOL_IC_1_VALUE 0x40
119
120/* DAC_CLIP - Registers (IC 1) */
121#define REG_DAC_CLIP_IC_1_ADDR 0xB
122#define REG_DAC_CLIP_IC_1_BYTE 1
123#define REG_DAC_CLIP_IC_1_VALUE 0xFF
124
125/* SPT_CTRL1 - Registers (IC 1) */
126#define REG_SPT_CTRL1_IC_1_ADDR 0xC
127#define REG_SPT_CTRL1_IC_1_BYTE 1
128#define REG_SPT_CTRL1_IC_1_VALUE 0x0
129
130/* SPT_CTRL2 - Registers (IC 1) */
131#define REG_SPT_CTRL2_IC_1_ADDR 0xD
132#define REG_SPT_CTRL2_IC_1_BYTE 1
133#define REG_SPT_CTRL2_IC_1_VALUE 0x0
134
135/* AMP_CTRL - Registers (IC 1) */
136#define REG_AMP_CTRL_IC_1_ADDR 0xE
137#define REG_AMP_CTRL_IC_1_BYTE 1
138#define REG_AMP_CTRL_IC_1_VALUE 0x15
139
140/* LIM_CTRL - Registers (IC 1) */
141#define REG_LIM_CTRL_IC_1_ADDR 0xF
142#define REG_LIM_CTRL_IC_1_BYTE 1
143#define REG_LIM_CTRL_IC_1_VALUE 0x0
144
145/* LIM_CTRL2 - Registers (IC 1) */
146#define REG_LIM_CTRL2_IC_1_ADDR 0x10
147#define REG_LIM_CTRL2_IC_1_BYTE 1
148#define REG_LIM_CTRL2_IC_1_VALUE 0xA
149
150/* FAULT_CTRL - Registers (IC 1) */
151#define REG_FAULT_CTRL_IC_1_ADDR 0x11
152#define REG_FAULT_CTRL_IC_1_BYTE 1
153#define REG_FAULT_CTRL_IC_1_VALUE 0x0
154
155/* STATUS_CLR - Registers (IC 1) */
156#define REG_STATUS_CLR_IC_1_ADDR 0x12
157#define REG_STATUS_CLR_IC_1_BYTE 1
158#define REG_STATUS_CLR_IC_1_VALUE 0x0
159
160/* STATUS - Registers (IC 1) */
161#define REG_STATUS_IC_1_ADDR 0x13
162#define REG_STATUS_IC_1_BYTE 0
163#define REG_STATUS_IC_1_VALUE 0x0
164
165/* RESET - Registers (IC 1) */
166#define REG_RESET_IC_1_ADDR 0x14
167#define REG_RESET_IC_1_BYTE 1
168#define REG_RESET_IC_1_VALUE 0x0

171/*
172 *
173 * Control register's field descriptions
174 *
175 */
176
177/* VENDOR_ID (IC 1) */
178#define R0_VENDOR_IC_1 0x41 /* 01000001b [7:0] */
179#define R0_VENDOR_IC_1_MASK 0xFF
180#define R0_VENDOR_IC_1_SHIFT 0
181
182/* DEVICE_ID1 (IC 1) */
183#define R1_DEVICE1_IC_1 0x65 /* 01100101b [7:0] */
184#define R1_DEVICE1_IC_1_MASK 0xFF
185#define R1_DEVICE1_IC_1_SHIFT 0
186
187/* DEVICE_ID2 (IC 1) */
188#define R2_DEVICE2_IC_1 0x15 /* 00010101b [7:0] */
189#define R2_DEVICE2_IC_1_MASK 0xFF
190#define R2_DEVICE2_IC_1_SHIFT 0
191
192/* REVISION (IC 1) */
193#define R3_REV_IC_1 0x02 /* 00000010b [7:0] */
194#define R3_REV_IC_1_MASK 0xFF
195#define R3_REV_IC_1_SHIFT 0
196
197/* PWR_CTRL (IC 1) */
198#define R4_SPWDN_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [0] */
199#define R4_APWDN_EN_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [1] */
200#define R4_LIM_EN_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [4] */
201#define R4_SPWDN_IC_1_MASK 0x1
202#define R4_SPWDN_IC_1_SHIFT 0
203#define R4_APWDN_EN_IC_1_MASK 0x2
204#define R4_APWDN_EN_IC_1_SHIFT 1
205#define R4_LIM_EN_IC_1_MASK 0x10
206#define R4_LIM_EN_IC_1_SHIFT 4
207
208/* CLK_CTRL (IC 1) */
209#define R5_BCLK_RATE_IC_1 0x0 /* 00000b [4:0] */
210#define R5_BCLK_RATE_IC_1_MASK 0x1F
211#define R5_BCLK_RATE_IC_1_SHIFT 0
212
213/* PDM_CTRL (IC 1) */
214#define R6_PDM_MODE_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [0] */
215#define R6_PDM_FS_IC_1 0x0 /* 00b [2:1] */
216#define R6_PDM_CHAN_SEL_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [3] */
217#define R6_PDM_FILT_IC_1 0x2 /* 10b [5:4] */
218#define R6_PDM_PHASE_SEL_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [7] */
219#define R6_PDM_MODE_IC_1_MASK 0x1
220#define R6_PDM_MODE_IC_1_SHIFT 0
221#define R6_PDM_FS_IC_1_MASK 0x6
222#define R6_PDM_FS_IC_1_SHIFT 1
223#define R6_PDM_CHAN_SEL_IC_1_MASK 0x8
224#define R6_PDM_CHAN_SEL_IC_1_SHIFT 3
225#define R6_PDM_FILT_IC_1_MASK 0x30
226#define R6_PDM_FILT_IC_1_SHIFT 4
227#define R6_PDM_PHASE_SEL_IC_1_MASK 0x80
228#define R6_PDM_PHASE_SEL_IC_1_SHIFT 7
229
230/* DAC_CTRL1 (IC 1) */
231#define R7_DAC_FS_IC_1 0x5 /* 0101b [3:0] */
232#define R7_DAC_PWR_MODE_IC_1 0x1 /* 01b [5:4] */
233#define R7_DAC_IBIAS_IC_1 0x0 /* 00b [7:6] */
234#define R7_DAC_FS_IC_1_MASK 0xF
235#define R7_DAC_FS_IC_1_SHIFT 0
236#define R7_DAC_PWR_MODE_IC_1_MASK 0x30
237#define R7_DAC_PWR_MODE_IC_1_SHIFT 4
238#define R7_DAC_IBIAS_IC_1_MASK 0xC0
239#define R7_DAC_IBIAS_IC_1_SHIFT 6
240
241/* DAC_CTRL2 (IC 1) */
242#define R8_DAC_MUTE_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [0] */
243#define R8_DAC_VOL_MODE_IC_1 0x1 /* 01b [2:1] */
244#define R8_DAC_MORE_FILT_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [3] */
245#define R8_DAC_VOL_ZC_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [4] */
246#define R8_DAC_HARD_VOL_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [5] */
247#define R8_DAC_PERF_MODE_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [6] */
248#define R8_DAC_INVERT_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [7] */
249#define R8_DAC_MUTE_IC_1_MASK 0x1
250#define R8_DAC_MUTE_IC_1_SHIFT 0
251#define R8_DAC_VOL_MODE_IC_1_MASK 0x6
252#define R8_DAC_VOL_MODE_IC_1_SHIFT 1
253#define R8_DAC_MORE_FILT_IC_1_MASK 0x8
254#define R8_DAC_MORE_FILT_IC_1_SHIFT 3
255#define R8_DAC_VOL_ZC_IC_1_MASK 0x10
256#define R8_DAC_VOL_ZC_IC_1_SHIFT 4
257#define R8_DAC_HARD_VOL_IC_1_MASK 0x20
258#define R8_DAC_HARD_VOL_IC_1_SHIFT 5
259#define R8_DAC_PERF_MODE_IC_1_MASK 0x40
260#define R8_DAC_PERF_MODE_IC_1_SHIFT 6
261#define R8_DAC_INVERT_IC_1_MASK 0x80
262#define R8_DAC_INVERT_IC_1_SHIFT 7
263
264/* DAC_CTRL3 (IC 1) */
265#define R9_DAC_HPF_EN_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [0] */
266#define R9_DAC_HPF_FC_IC_1 0xD /* 1101b [7:4] */
267#define R9_DAC_HPF_EN_IC_1_MASK 0x1
268#define R9_DAC_HPF_EN_IC_1_SHIFT 0
269#define R9_DAC_HPF_FC_IC_1_MASK 0xF0
270#define R9_DAC_HPF_FC_IC_1_SHIFT 4
271
272/* DAC_VOL (IC 1) */
273#define R10_DAC_VOL_IC_1 0x40 /* 01000000b [7:0] */
274#define R10_DAC_VOL_IC_1_MASK 0xFF
275#define R10_DAC_VOL_IC_1_SHIFT 0
276
277/* DAC_CLIP (IC 1) */
278#define R11_DAC_HF_CLIP_IC_1 0xFF /* 11111111b [7:0] */
279#define R11_DAC_HF_CLIP_IC_1_MASK 0xFF
280#define R11_DAC_HF_CLIP_IC_1_SHIFT 0
281
282/* SPT_CTRL1 (IC 1) */
283#define R12_SPT_SAI_MODE_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [0] */
284#define R12_SPT_DATA_FORMAT_IC_1 0x0 /* 000b [3:1] */
285#define R12_SPT_SLOT_WIDTH_IC_1 0x0 /* 00b [5:4] */
286#define R12_SPT_BCLK_POL_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [6] */
287#define R12_SPT_LRCLK_POL_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [7] */
288#define R12_SPT_SAI_MODE_IC_1_MASK 0x1
289#define R12_SPT_SAI_MODE_IC_1_SHIFT 0
290#define R12_SPT_DATA_FORMAT_IC_1_MASK 0xE
291#define R12_SPT_DATA_FORMAT_IC_1_SHIFT 1
292#define R12_SPT_SLOT_WIDTH_IC_1_MASK 0x30
293#define R12_SPT_SLOT_WIDTH_IC_1_SHIFT 4
294#define R12_SPT_BCLK_POL_IC_1_MASK 0x40
295#define R12_SPT_BCLK_POL_IC_1_SHIFT 6
296#define R12_SPT_LRCLK_POL_IC_1_MASK 0x80
297#define R12_SPT_LRCLK_POL_IC_1_SHIFT 7
298
299/* SPT_CTRL2 (IC 1) */
300#define R13_SPT_SLOT_SEL_IC_1 0x0 /* 00000b [4:0] */
301#define R13_SPT_SLOT_SEL_IC_1_MASK 0x1F
302#define R13_SPT_SLOT_SEL_IC_1_SHIFT 0
303
304/* AMP_CTRL (IC 1) */
305#define R14_AMP_LPM_IC_1 0x1 /* 1b [0] */
306#define R14_EMI_MODE_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [1] */
307#define R14_AMP_RLOAD_IC_1 0x1 /* 01b [3:2] */
308#define R14_OCP_EN_IC_1 0x1 /* 1b [4] */
309#define R14_AMP_LPM_IC_1_MASK 0x1
310#define R14_AMP_LPM_IC_1_SHIFT 0
311#define R14_EMI_MODE_IC_1_MASK 0x2
312#define R14_EMI_MODE_IC_1_SHIFT 1
313#define R14_AMP_RLOAD_IC_1_MASK 0xC
314#define R14_AMP_RLOAD_IC_1_SHIFT 2
315#define R14_OCP_EN_IC_1_MASK 0x10
316#define R14_OCP_EN_IC_1_SHIFT 4
317
318/* LIM_CTRL (IC 1) */
319#define R15_LIM_ATR_IC_1 0x0 /* 00b [1:0] */
320#define R15_LIM_RRT_IC_1 0x0 /* 00b [5:4] */
321#define R15_LIM_ATR_IC_1_MASK 0x3
322#define R15_LIM_ATR_IC_1_SHIFT 0
323#define R15_LIM_RRT_IC_1_MASK 0x30
324#define R15_LIM_RRT_IC_1_SHIFT 4
325
326/* LIM_CTRL2 (IC 1) */
327#define R16_LIM_THRES_IC_1 0xA /* 01010b [4:0] */
328#define R16_LIM_THRES_IC_1_MASK 0x1F
329#define R16_LIM_THRES_IC_1_SHIFT 0
330
331/* FAULT_CTRL (IC 1) */
332#define R17_ARCV_OCP_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [0] */
333#define R17_ARCV_OTF_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [1] */
334#define R17_ARCV_UVLO_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [2] */
335#define R17_MRCV_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [4] */
336#define R17_ARCV_OCP_IC_1_MASK 0x1
337#define R17_ARCV_OCP_IC_1_SHIFT 0
338#define R17_ARCV_OTF_IC_1_MASK 0x2
339#define R17_ARCV_OTF_IC_1_SHIFT 1
340#define R17_ARCV_UVLO_IC_1_MASK 0x4
341#define R17_ARCV_UVLO_IC_1_SHIFT 2
342#define R17_MRCV_IC_1_MASK 0x10
343#define R17_MRCV_IC_1_SHIFT 4
344
345/* STATUS_CLR (IC 1) */
346#define R18_STAT_CLR_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [0] */
347#define R18_STAT_CLR_IC_1_MASK 0x1
348#define R18_STAT_CLR_IC_1_SHIFT 0
349
350/* STATUS (IC 1) */
351#define R19_OCP_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [0] */
352#define R19_OTF_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [1] */
353#define R19_OTW_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [2] */
354#define R19_UVLO_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [3] */
355#define R19_CLK_ERR_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [4] */
356#define R19_SPT_ERR_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [5] */
357#define R19_CLIP_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [6] */
358#define R19_LIM_EG_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [7] */
359#define R19_OCP_IC_1_MASK 0x1
360#define R19_OCP_IC_1_SHIFT 0
361#define R19_OTF_IC_1_MASK 0x2
362#define R19_OTF_IC_1_SHIFT 1
363#define R19_OTW_IC_1_MASK 0x4
364#define R19_OTW_IC_1_SHIFT 2
365#define R19_UVLO_IC_1_MASK 0x8
366#define R19_UVLO_IC_1_SHIFT 3
367#define R19_CLK_ERR_IC_1_MASK 0x10
368#define R19_CLK_ERR_IC_1_SHIFT 4
369#define R19_SPT_ERR_IC_1_MASK 0x20
370#define R19_SPT_ERR_IC_1_SHIFT 5
371#define R19_CLIP_IC_1_MASK 0x40
372#define R19_CLIP_IC_1_SHIFT 6
373#define R19_LIM_EG_IC_1_MASK 0x80
374#define R19_LIM_EG_IC_1_SHIFT 7
375
376/* RESET (IC 1) */
377#define R20_SOFT_RESET_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [0] */
378#define R20_SOFT_FULL_RESET_IC_1 0x0 /* 0b [4] */
379#define R20_SOFT_RESET_IC_1_MASK 0x1
380#define R20_SOFT_RESET_IC_1_SHIFT 0
381#define R20_SOFT_FULL_RESET_IC_1_MASK 0x10
382#define R20_SOFT_FULL_RESET_IC_1_SHIFT 4
383
384typedef enum
385{
386 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_GAIN_P240DB = 0x00, /* 24dB */
387 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_GAIN_P228DB = 0x03, /* 22.875dB */
388 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_GAIN_P180DB = 0x10, /* 18dB */
389 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_GAIN_P97DB = 0x26, /* 9.75dB */
390 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_GAIN_P60DB = 0x30, /* 6dB */
391 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_GAIN_P30DB = 0x38, /* 3dB */
392 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_GAIN_0DB = 0x40, /* 0dB */
393 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_GAIN_M11DB = 0x43, /* -1.125dB */
394 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_GAIN_M30DB = 0x48, /* -3dB */
395 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_GAIN_M60DB = 0x50, /* -6dB */
396 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_GAIN_M90DB = 0x58, /* -9dB */
397 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_GAIN_M720DB = 0xFF, /* -72dB, Mute */
398}
399am_devices_ssm6515_gain_e;
400
401// Generic or interface specific status.
402typedef enum
403{
404 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_STATUS_SUCCESS,
405 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_STATUS_FAIL,
406 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_STATUS_INVALID_HANDLE,
407 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_STATUS_IN_USE,
408 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_STATUS_TIMEOUT,
409 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_STATUS_OUT_OF_RANGE,
410 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_STATUS_INVALID_ARG,
411 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_STATUS_INVALID_OPERATION,
412 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_STATUS_MEM_ERR,
413 AM_DEVICES_SSM6515_STATUS_HW_ERR,
414} am_devices_SSM6515_status_t;
415
416// SSM6515 channel mode
417typedef enum
418{
419 SSM6515_LEFT = 0, // Left channel
420 SSM6515_RIGHT, // Right channel
421 SSM6515_LEFT_RIGHT, // (Left + Right) / 2
422 SSM6515_MONO, // Mono mode
423} am_devices_SSM6515_ch_t;
424
425// SSM6515 mute status
426typedef enum
427{
428 SSM6515_MUTE = 0, // Mute SSM6515
429 SSM6515_UNMUTE, // Unmute SSM6515
430} am_devices_SSM6515_mute_t;
431
432typedef enum
433{
434 SSM6515_UP = 0x00, // Power Up SSM6515
435 SSM6515_DOWN = 0x01 // Power Down SSM6515
436} am_devices_SSM6515_power_t;
437
438typedef enum
439{
440 SSM6515_STEREO = 0, // Select Stereo(I2S, LJ, RJ) Mode
441 SSM6515_TDM = 1 // Select TDM Mode
442} am_devices_SSM6515_mode_t;
